name: Jitsi Meet
desc: Secure, Simple and Scalable Video Conferences

options.name: caddy.enable
options.desc: Whether to enable caddy reverse proxy to expose jitsi-meet.

options.name: config
options.desc: Client-side web application settings that override the defaults in config.js .  See  https://github.com/jitsi/jitsi-meet/blob/master/config.js for default configuration with comments.

options.name: enable
options.desc: Whether to enable Jitsi Meet - Secure, Simple and Scalable VideoConferences.

options.name: excalidraw.enable
options.desc: Whether to enable Excalidraw collaboration backend for Jitsi.

options.name: excalidraw.port
options.desc: The port which the Excalidraw backend for Jitsi should listen to.
options.type: 16 bit unsigned integer; between 0 and 65535 (both inclusive)

options.name: extraConfig
options.desc: Text to append to  config.js  web application config file.  Can be used to insert JavaScript logic to determine user’s region incascading bridges setup.

options.name: hostName
options.desc: FQDN of the Jitsi Meet instance.

options.name: interfaceConfig
options.desc: Client-side web-app interface settings that override the defaults in interface_config.js .  See  https://github.com/jitsi/jitsi-meet/blob/master/interface_config.js for default configuration with comments.

options.name: jibri.enable
options.desc: Whether to enable a Jibri instance and configure it to connect toProsody.  Additional configuration is possible with  services.jibri , and  services.jibri.finalizeScript  is especiallyuseful.

options.name: jicofo.enable
options.desc: Whether to enable JiCoFo instance and configure it to connect toProsody.  Additional configuration is possible with  services.jicofo .

options.name: jigasi.enable
options.desc: Whether to enable jigasi instance and configure it to connect toProsody.  Additional configuration is possible with services.jigasi .

options.name: nginx.enable
options.desc: Whether to enable nginx virtual host that will serve the javascriptapplication and act as a proxy for the XMPP server. Further nginxconfiguration can be done by adapting  services.nginx.virtualHosts.<hostName> . Whenthis is enabled, ACME will be used to retrieve a TLS certificate bydefault. To disable this, set the  services.nginx.virtualHosts.<hostName>.enableACME to  false  and if appropriate do the same for  services.nginx.virtualHosts.<hostName>.forceSSL .

options.name: prosody.enable
options.desc: Whether to configure Prosody to relay XMPP messages between JitsiMeet components. Turn this off if you want to configure it manually.

options.name: secureDomain.authentication
options.desc: The authentication type to be used by jitsi

options.name: secureDomain.enable
options.desc: Whether to enable Authenticated room creation.

options.name: videobridge.enable
options.desc: Jitsi Videobridge instance and configure it to connect toProsody.  Additional configuration is possible with  services.jitsi-videobridge

options.name: videobridge.passwordFile
options.desc: File containing password to the Prosody account for videobridge.  If  null , a file with password will be generatedautomatically. Setting this option is useful if you plan to connectadditional videobridges to the XMPP server.
